attributes.additional_details:
Life meaning life for Murders, Rapists, pedophiles and any other hideous crime that carries a life sentence.

10 years ago a friend of mine Ross Parker was murdered and his 3 killers all convicted and sentenced to LIFE yet they could be out as soon as 13 years later Ross's family face a lifetime without him watching him flourish and enjoy his life why should people like this or any others who commit crimes like this be allowed back in to society. If you believe like i do that people so Evil should never be set free please sign here.
